## When to use
Use this skill when changing /deploy/helm/** or K8s runtime behavior.

## Objectives
- Keep charts safe-by-default (no secrets in values.yaml).
- Support profiles via overlays in /profiles/.
- Minimize naming collisions and keep resource names short.
